CustomBehavior.Macro: /script SetCVar('AutoLootDefault', 1)

CustomBehavior.Text: Compiling Dun Morogh Map Zone
Moving to DUN MOROGH, Please do not stop bot

There is a problem moving char to quest

 Please move your char to: DUN MOROGH
 and start bot.

CustomBehavior.Macro: /click QuestFrameAcceptButton
/click QuestFrameAcceptButton

CustomBehavior.Text: Upgrating Bag Procedures. Going to Buy : 1 Brown Leather Satchel. Please do not stop bot.

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i) do z=GetContainerItemID(i,j) if z == 4498 then PickupBagFromSlot(20); PickupContainerItem(i,j); end end end
